entry.title: Zoe Click Clack Sofa Bed (Brown)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Infiniteimports
Type:
Price: 299.00

Perfect convertible sofa to sit or sleep on. The quick mechanism easily takes the back from a seated to flat position for when you want to take a quick nap. There is also a inclined position for when you want to lounge and relax. Space-saving design that can complete any space while providing a variety of functions. Style meets function while accenting any living space perfectly.


ZOEBRN Sleeper Sofa Bed 68”W 40”D 31”H

  • Brown Colour
  • Chrome Legs
  • Back Adjustable to 3 Positions

entry.title: Shelly #2007
entry.summary:
Vendor: infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Set
Price: 1000.00

Symmetrical U shape sectional in a beautiful grey finish. This sectional is the perfect piece for any family room. It can be re arranged into a large bed so the whole family can cozy up for movie night or it can be easily re arranged into a sectional with ample seating for friends and family. The Shelly sectional is a medium firmness seating so that it still provides comfort while still supporting you.

 

Modular Sectional

Unlimited Ways to Configure

Grey Durable Fabric; Can Be Made Into A Bed

Enough Room For The Whole Family

entry.title: 6812-6047 Sectional with Pull Out Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Bed
Price: 1149.00

6047-6812 is a 2-Piece Sectional with Pull-out Bed and Hidden Storage, Available in chaise facing left or chaise facing right.

Providing the flexible option for relaxation, sleep and storage, 6047 Sleeper sofa will be a stylish and functional addition to your living room. Storage chaise is also included with the set. The lower portion of the seating configuration pulls out to reveal a pop up trundle that creates a bed space creating a relaxing environment with minimal effort. Grey color technical thick and durable fabric is used to upholster this unique set 

6812GRY Sectional 102”W 62”D 42”H

  • Technical Nubuck Fabric
  • Pull Out Sofa Bed
  • Built In Storage In Chaise
  • High Back Rest

entry.title: Rui 6038 Reversible Sleeper Sectional Sofa Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Infiniteimports
Type: sectional
Price: 699.99

Casual contemporary styling creates a modern look for your living room in the Rui Collection. The reversible configuration of the three-seat sectional comes in the form of the chaise that is utilized as the base for the reversible end chaise cushion and arms, creating the option of a left or right extension of the sofa seating. The two-seat section of the sofa features a pull-out bed that, when extended, pairs to the chaise to create a bed. The gray fabric cover paired with the streamlined profile of the sofa lend to the versatile look of the collection.


RUI Sectional 88”W 60”D 36”H

  • Reversible
  • Pull Out Sofa Bed
  • Built In Storage In Chaise
  • Padded Back Rest

entry.title: Brock Collection Sleeper Sofa
entry.summary:
Vendor: infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Bed
Price: 899.99

Though this iconic invention has been around since the turn of the 20th
century, saving space never goes out of style. Bring the detail and design you love about your contemporary couch to a fully functioning sleeper sofa, this charming convertible Sleeper is an excellent option for your den, home office, or multi-purpose guest room. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame with metal mechanisms, this dapper design strikes a clean-lined silhouette with a supportive backrest, square arms, and block legs.

BROCKSOFABED  Closed 32"D 85"W 36"H
BROCKSOFABED Open    59"D 85"W 36"H

entry.title: 6156 Sleeper Sectional
entry.summary:
Vendor: Infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Bed
Price: 1349.99

6156 is a 3-Piece Sectional with Pull-out Bed and Hidden Storage

Providing the flexible option for relaxation, sleep and storage, 6156 Sleeper sofa will be a stylish and functional addition to your living room. Storage ottoman is also included with the set along with 2 throw pillows. The lower portion of the seating configuration pulls out to reveal a pop up trundle that creates a bed space creating a relaxing environment with minimal effort. Grey color technical thick and durable fabric is used to upholster this unique set and is also equipped with USB charging ports on the side of the arm for easy access to a charging port.
